title: Granting You A Dreamlike Life - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama   Crime   Criminals   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Living Abroad   Racism   Wars
author: 橘子宸
description: A food critic, Lin Jing Yun who was born and bred in France, returns to her family home to find an old diary that chronicles a love story between a popular actress Tian Ying/Lin Ruomeng and the son of a triad leader, Luo Fu Sheng during 1930s Shanghai>
